```{r}
number_sightings_per_state <- bigfoot_data %>%
  count(state)
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)

state_bar <- ggplot(number_sightings_per_state,
       aes(state, n)) +
        geom_col(fill = "#0047AB") +
        theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 60, hjust = 1), panel.background =       element_rect(fill = "#F0FFFF"), plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#F0FFFF"), axis.ticks = element_blank(), panel.grid.major = element_blank(), panel.grid.minor = element_blank())
       
```
